title: The Admiral’s Mistress
description: A young soldier returns home to his love, but the horrors of war haunt him. He must rediscover the part of himself that remembers how to love.
quote: I’ve taken the measure of many ladies’ virtue and come up short.
alt1: The Admiral speaks with Lord Sheridan
alt2: The Admiral speaks with a young girl
alt4: The Admiral wounded in war, embracing a nurse
